localTransport.details: Use pre-paid taxis or app-based ride services for convenient airport transfers. Consider using the efficient local train network for travel within the city.

accommodation.name: The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai
accommodation.address: Apollo Bunder, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India

activities.title: Arrival in Mumbai & Transfer to The Taj Mahal Palace
activities.description: Arrive at Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (BOM). Take a pre-paid taxi to The Taj Mahal Palace hotel in Colaba. Check in and freshen up.
activities.location: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (BOM) to Colaba

activities.title: Explore Gateway of India
activities.description: Visit the iconic Gateway of India, a historical monument overlooking the Arabian Sea. Take photos and soak in the atmosphere.

activities.title: Visit Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST)
activities.description: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage Site, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (formerly Victoria Terminus), an architectural marvel.

activities.title: Dinner at Leopold Cafe
activities.description: Enjoy dinner at Leopold Cafe, a historic restaurant known for its food and ambiance.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at a Local Thali Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a local restaurant serving traditional vegetarian or non-vegetarian thalis, supporting local businesses.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local businesses and reduces food miles.

activities.title: Morning Walk at Marine Drive
activities.description: Enjoy a refreshing morning walk along Marine Drive, also known as the Queen's Necklace.

activities.title: Visit the Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum
activities.description: Explore the Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum, a former residence of Mahatma Gandhi, showcasing his life and work.

activities.title: Lunch at Britannia & Co.
activities.description: Have lunch at Britannia & Co., a Parsi restaurant famous for its berry pulao and other Irani dishes.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at Local Udupi Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Eat at an Udupi restaurant which serves local traditional cuisine which are made from locally sourced ingredients.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Promotes local food culture and reduces reliance on processed foods.

activities.title: Shopping at Colaba Causeway
activities.description: Enjoy street shopping at Colaba Causeway, known for its affordable clothing, accessories, and souvenirs.

sustainableAlternative.title: Support Local Artisans
sustainableAlternative.description: Opt for handicrafts made by local artisans instead of mass-produced items to support the local economy.

activities.title: Travel to Airport
activities.description: Travel to Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (BOM) for your return flight.
activities.location: Colaba to Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (BOM)
